Token.Abstract: The Pebble Central responsible for calling the delegate method.

Parameter.Name: central
Parameter.Abstract: The Pebble Central responsible for calling the delegate method.

Parameter.Name: watch
Parameter.Abstract: The PBWatch object representing the watch that was connected.

Parameter.Name: isNew
Parameter.Abstract: YES if the watch has been connected for the first time since the app has been installed or NO if not.

Token.Abstract: The Pebble Central responsible for calling the delegate method.

Parameter.Name: central
Parameter.Abstract: The Pebble Central responsible for calling the delegate method.

Parameter.Name: watch
Parameter.Abstract: The PBWatch object representing the watch that was disconnected.
